title: VACANT! FOR ASAP OR 9/1-PORCH-SUNNY! CAT OK-TONS OF SPACE! OAK SQUARE!
posting_body: MOVE IN ASAP - VACANT - AUGUST 1ST or MID AUGUST OR SEPTEMBER 1st works as well - Broker's fee is 1 month's rent
NO SECURITY DEPOSIT, JUST 1ST month's rent, LAST month's rent,
great sunny 1 bedroom in Brighton Oak Square, built-in Air Conditioner, third floor unit with nice porch.
Plush thick carpeting will be shampooed completely and apartment will be cleaned completely.

Kitchen looks great with the tons of counter space, dishwasher, nice large living room, porch, large kitchen with dishwasher, high ceilings, great bathroom with new tiling, large bedroom fits a large bed, dresser and desk.
Tons of sun light, located in Brighton near buses 57, 501, 503 and 64 bus lines.
These buses go to Kenmore, Allston, Downtown Boston, Copley Square, Kendall Square and Central Square in Cambridge.
More info on these buses go to the <URL> site.
Utilities are NOT included (everything runs on electric).
Text Dennis from precise realty to show 781-475-9777, thanks for viewing this ad
